name: super-potion
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
flavor_text.platinum: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
